--- alter_table_drop_column.sql
alter table foo drop column bar

--- AST
&parser.AlterTable{
  pos:  0,
  Name: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  12,
    end:  15,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &parser.DropColumn{
    pos:  16,
    Name: &parser.Ident{
      pos:  28,
      end:  31,
      Name: "bar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo DROP COLUMN bar
